system.description:
• Darkvision (+1): Dwarven eyes are accustomed to the dark of the underearth. They can see in Pitch Darkness up to 10” (20 yards), ignoring all Illumination penalties and up to 2 points of penalties from invisibility or similar powers.

  • Reduced Pace (−1): Dwarves have short legs compared to human-sized ancestries. Decrease their Pace by 1 and their running die one die type.

  • Stonecunning (+2): Generations of delving into the depths of the Mror Holds has taught the Dwarves how to identify unusual stonework, granting them the Stonecunning Edge.

  • Tough (+2): Dwarves are genetically stout and tough. They start with a d6 in Vigor instead of a d4. This increases their maximum Vigor to d12+1.

Dwarven eyes are accustomed to the dark of the underearth. They can see in Pitch Darkness up to 10” (20 yards), ignoring all Illumination penalties and up to 2 points of penalties from invisibility or similar powers.
